message.name: ERR_OVERLAPPING_SPONSORSHIP
message.locale: Une Fiche de parrainage existe déjà pour ce participant pour une période de chevauchement.

message.name: ERR_OVERLAPPING_RESIDENCE_PERIOD
message.locale: Un dossier pour une période de résidence existe déjà pour une période de chevauchement.

message.name: ERR_RESIDENCE_TYPE_REQUIRED
message.locale: A Residence Period record cannot be applied unless 'Canadian Residence Type' is entered._fr

message.name: ERR_OAS_RECOVERY_TAX_DEDUCTION_ALREADY_APPLIED
message.locale: 'Monthly Recovery Tax Amount' or 'Start Date' cannot be modified because the associated deduction is already applied._fr

message.name: ERR_OAS_RECOVERY_TAX_DEDUCTION_DELETE
message.locale: The evidence cannot be deleted as the OAS Recovery Tax deduction has been used in the gross to net payment calculation._fr

message.name: ERR_OVERLAPPING_OAS_CANADIAN_RESIDENCE_PERIOD
message.locale: Residence Period evidence with a 'Canadian Residence Type' of 'Residence' or 'Deemed Residence' exists for this client for an overlapping period._fr

message.name: ERR_OAS_NRT_DEDUCTION_START_DATE_MODIFY
message.locale: 'Start' date cannot be changed since the Correction amount has been processed._fr

message.name: ERR_OAS_NRT_DEDUCTION_DELETE
message.locale: Non-Resident Correction Evidence cannot be deleted as it is used in previous payment processing._fr
